events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday afternoon and need to file a claim for damages sustained by my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and claim details submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claims process and address any immediate concerns.
We have officially acknowledged your claim and started processing it with priority to expedite support and resolution.
Please provide the police report, photographs of the car damage, and any witness statements to support your claim assessment.
All requested documents including the police report and photos of the vehicle have been submitted through the online portal.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the evidence and circumstances surrounding the vehicle collision to determine liability.
The investigation into the accident has been completed successfully, confirming coverage and the extent of damages.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair estimates and policy terms to resolve your auto accident claim efficiently.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the promptness of the claim settlement proposal and communication throughout.
Your claim has been officially approved, authorizing the next steps for payment and vehicle repair arrangements.
The settlement payment has been issued to your designated bank account to cover the repair costs of your damaged car.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following full payment and confirmation of completed vehicle repairs.
The claim documents and records have been archived securely for future reference in compliance with company policies.
